name: Marvelpedia
description:
Technology Used: ​React, Express.js, Node.js, Google Cloud Vision API

I utilized Marvel's API to make calls to their extensive comic database and filtered that info encyclopedia style. I used Google's Cloud Vision API to identify characters in photos that can are encoded to base64 and sent directly to Google without the need for storing photos in a database.

name: UnTapped Trivia
description:
Technology Used: React, React Native, Express.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Socket.io

I created the React Native portion of a bar trivia app that connects via websockets to our React “admin” app. I utilized Passport.js and vanilla JS to create OAuth 2.0 authentication with Facebook and Google on both mobile and the React app. I also, added and edited permissions in Xcode/Obj-C in order to gain Geolocation and Camera access for iPhone users.

name: Mars Mining Drone
description:
Technology Used: Node.js

Built for Headlight Lab's Mars Mining Drone Challenge in 2018. I created a Node.js based algorithm within the course of 4 hours from assignment to submission that would power a drone to automatically find and mine materials remotely on Mars.

name: MHI Academy
description:
Technology Used: Node.js, Express.js, React/Redux, PostgreSQL

A faux school directory built for our first project at Fullstack Academy with fully editable students and campuses.

name: The Light Web
description:
Technology Used: React/Redux, Express,js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Passport.js, Stripe API

Created authentication strategies using Passport.js for Google OAuth and JWTs for local authentication.Used Nodemailer to send automated email confirmations on account creation password retrieval, and order creation.
